name: Skater Good Boy
description:
Skater Good Boy Skate and perform stunts to gain speed

Arrows or WASD: Move
Space or Z: Hold to jump
ESC or P: Pause

You are a skater puppy! Skate down the street and avoid the obstacles! Every time you jump, you gain some speed. If you lose too much speed, you lose..

The longer you hold the jump button, the higher you jump. When you release it, the puppy will jump and do a stunt.

Share in the comments your max time and top speed!

This game was created for Mini Jam 86: Sports

Programming, art and everything by @rthurmed.

This project was made with the Godot Game Engine (v3.3.2).

This project uses "mousetrap" font. Made by jeti. Licensed under CC BY 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ . More info: https://fontenddev.com/fonts/mousetrap .
